uk.ac.man.jb.pct.mvc.model
Class CommandLineInputData

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.man.jb.pct.mvc.model.CommandLineInputData
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_CommandLineInputData
public class CommandLineInputData
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_CommandLineInputData

This class is used to process and store the command line input to the application. It is simply a wrapper that tries to simply the process of passing these in.

Author:
Rob Lyon
